attributes.action: Start taking these petitions seriously and stop using them as a PR whitewash.
attributes.background: Do any of these petitions ever actually get actioned? Probably not. You work for the people and need to start listening. Start taking these petitions seriously.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
